html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

POL Advance

{{doc.name}}
Equipment: {{doc.equipment}} Entry Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.entry_date) }}
Equipment Number: {{doc.equipment_number}} Fuel Book: {{ doc.fuelbook }}
Cost Center: {{ doc.cost_center }} Fuelbook Branch: {{doc.fuelbook_branch}}

Payment Type: {{doc.payment_type}} Amount: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Supplier: {{doc.supplier}} Adjusted Amount: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.adjusted_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Credit Account: {{ doc.expense_account }} Balance Amount: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.balance_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}

Branch: {{doc.branch}}
Business Activity: {{ doc.business_activity }}

{% if doc.voucher_type != 'Journal Entry'%}
Cheque No.: {%- if doc.cheque_no -%} {{doc.cheque_no}} {%- endif -%}
Cheque Date: {%- if doc.cheque_no -%} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date) }} {%- endif -%}
{% endif %}
Pay To / Recd From: {{ doc.pay_to_recd_from }}
Narration: {%- if doc.user_remark -%} {{doc.user_remark}} {%- endif -%}
Verified By:

(Head Of Finance)

Approved By:

(Approving Officer)

Received By:

(Date, Name & Signature)

{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}
name: POL Advance
